description:
---

### [choco://setpoint](choco://setpoint)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

![Screenshot of Logitech SetPoint](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/asheroto/ChocolateyPackages/6b0cfafee48c4acbc588c8b7fd79d72e64ae5c3e/logitech-setpoint/screenshot.png)
	
SetPoint lets you customize your mouse buttons, keyboard F-keys and hot-keys, control tracking speed, and configure other device-specific settings. It can also notify you of your device's battery status, and whether Caps Lock and Num Lock are on.

#### Package Note
This is a virtual package to help find and install [Logitech Setpoint](https://community.chocolatey.org/packages/setpoint). It will install the program package `setpoint` as a dependency.
summary: SetPoint lets you customize your mouse, keyboard, touchpad and number pad settings in Windows.
author: Logitech
